edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.util

Class Base64BinaryAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.xml.bind.annotation.adapters.XmlAdapter<String,byte[]>
      • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.util.Base64BinaryAdapter

  • public class Base64BinaryAdapter
extends XmlAdapter<String,byte[]>
    This class is an adapter to enable writing binary data to XML (or other string representations) encoded as base 64.
    Author:
    Colin J. Fuller
